mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES (SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{tel}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{preference}, SYSDATE, NULL, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.BIRTH, B.GENDER, A.ADDRESS, A.ADDRESS_DETAIL, A.TEL, A.PHONE, A.EMAIL, C.PREFER_PLANTS, A.ENROLL_DATE, A.DEL_DATE, A.STATUS FROM MEMBER A JOIN GENDER B ON A.GENDER = B.GEN_CODE JOIN PREFERENCE C ON A.PREFERENCE = C.PREFER_CODE ORDER BY A.USER_NO DESC

SELECT A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.BIRTH, B.GENDER, A.ADDRESS, A.ADDRESS_DETAIL, A.TEL, A.PHONE, A.EMAIL, C.PREFER_PLANTS, A.ENROLL_DATE, A.DEL_DATE, A.STATUS FROM MEMBER A JOIN GENDER B ON A.GENDER = B.GEN_CODE JOIN PREFERENCE C ON A.PREFERENCE = C.PREFER_CODE WHERE USER_NO = #{mno}
